TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReaderWriterLockSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示用于管理资源访问的锁定状态，可实现多线程读取或进行独占式写入访问。

span.span: Represents a lock that is used to manage access to a resource, allowing multiple threads for reading or exclusive access for writing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用保护是由多个线程读取，并由一个线程一次写入到的资源。Use to protect a resource that is read by multiple threads and written to by one thread at a time. 允许多个线程处于读取模式，允许一个线程处于写入模式并独占锁，并允许具有读取访问权限是在可升级的读取模式下，线程可以升级为写入模式，而无需放弃它的一个线程s 读取资源的访问权限。 allows multiple threads to be in read mode, allows one thread to be in write mode with exclusive ownership of the lock, and allows one thread that has read access to be in upgradeable read mode, from which the thread can upgrade to write mode without having to relinquish its read access to the resource. > [!NOTE] > 虽然 类似于 ，但不同之处在于，前者简化了递归规则以及锁状态的升级和降级规则。 is similar to , but it has simplified rules for recursion and for upgrading and downgrading lock state. 避免了许多潜在的死锁情况。 avoids many cases of potential deadlock. 另外， 的性能显著优于 。In addition, the performance of is significantly better than . 建议对所有新开发的项目使用 。 is recommended for all new development. 默认情况下的新实例使用创建标记并不允许递归。By default, new instances of are created with the flag and do not allow recursion. 对于所有新开发，建议，此默认策略，因为递归带来不必要的复杂情况，使您的代码更容易出现死锁。This default policy is recommended for all new development, because recursion introduces unnecessary complications and makes your code more prone to deadlocks. 若要简化迁移的现有项目，使用或，可以使用标志，用于创建的实例允许递归。To simplify migration from existing projects that use or , you can use the flag to create instances of that allow recursion. 一个线程可以进入锁定状态三种模式： 模式、 写入模式，并进入可升级的读取的模式，请阅读。A thread can enter the lock in three modes: read mode, write mode, and upgradeable read mode. (在本主题的其余部分，"升级的读取的模式"称为"可升级模式"，并且"输入`x`模式下"使用优先于较长的短语"输入中的锁`x`模式"。)(In the rest of this topic, "upgradeable read mode" is referred to as "upgradeable mode", and the phrase "enter `x` mode" is used in preference to the longer phrase "enter the lock in `x` mode".) 无论递归策略只有一个线程可以在任何时间是在写模式下。Regardless of recursion policy, only one thread can be in write mode at any time. 当线程在写模式下，没有其他线程可以在任何模式下输入该锁。When a thread is in write mode, no other thread can enter the lock in any mode. 只有一个线程可以在任何时间是可升级模式。Only one thread can be in upgradeable mode at any time. 读取模式，可以为任意数量的线程中, 可以有一个线程进入可升级模式虽然其他线程处于读取模式。Any number of threads can be in read mode, and there can be one thread in upgradeable mode while other threads are in read mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 具有托管线程关联;也就是说，每个对象必须使其自己的方法调用以进入和退出锁模式。 has managed thread affinity; that is, each object must make its own method calls to enter and exit lock modes. 没有线程可以更改另一个线程的模式。No thread can change the mode of another thread. 如果不允许递归中，线程尝试进入锁定可阻止有几个原因：If a does not allow recursion, a thread that tries to enter the lock can block for several reasons: - 尝试进入读取的模式块，如果有多个线程等待进入写入模式也写模式时出现一个线程的线程。A thread that tries to enter read mode blocks if there are threads waiting to enter write mode or if there is a single thread in write mode. > [!NOTE] > 编写器进行排队时阻止新的读取器是偏向写入器锁公平性策略。Blocking new readers when writers are queued is a lock fairness policy that favors writers. 当前的公平性策略平衡到读取器和编写器，以提升的最常见的方案中的吞吐量的公平性。The current fairness policy balances fairness to readers and writers, to promote throughput in the most common scenarios. 未来版本[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]可能会引入新的公平性策略。Future versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] may introduce new fairness policies. - 尝试进入可升级模式块写入模式在单个线程是否中已存在一个线程进入可升级模式，如果有多个线程等待进入写入模式，或者一个线程。A thread that tries to enter upgradeable mode blocks if there is already a thread in upgradeable mode, if there are threads waiting to enter write mode, or if there is a single thread in write mode. - 尝试进入写入模式块是否存在三种模式之一中的线程的线程。A thread that tries to enter write mode blocks if there is a thread in any of the three modes. ## 升级和降级锁Upgrading and Downgrading Locks 可升级模式适用于在其中一个线程通常读取从受保护资源的情况下，但可能需要满足某些条件时才向其写入。Upgradeable mode is intended for cases where a thread usually reads from the protected resource, but might need to write to it if some condition is met. 线程已进入进入可升级模式中具有读取访问权限受保护的资源，并可进行升级，通过调用写入模式或方法。A thread that has entered a in upgradeable mode has read access to the protected resource, and can upgrade to write mode by calling the or methods. 中可以有只有一个线程进入可升级模式一次，因为升级为写入模式不能发生死锁时不允许递归，这是默认策略。Because there can be only one thread in upgradeable mode at a time, upgrading to write mode cannot deadlock when recursion is not allowed, which is the default policy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无论递归策略，最初进入的线程读取模式下不允许，升级到可升级模式或写入模式，因为这种方式导致死锁的概率。Regardless of recursion policy, a thread that initially entered read mode is not allowed to upgrade to upgradeable mode or write mode, because that pattern creates a strong probability of deadlocks. 例如，如果两个线程在读取模式下都尝试进入写入模式，它们将死锁。For example, if two threads in read mode both try to enter write mode, they will deadlock. 可升级模式旨在避免这类死锁。Upgradeable mode is designed to avoid such deadlocks. 如果在读取模式下，升级块的线程有其他线程。If there are other threads in read mode, the thread that is upgrading blocks. 虽然线程被阻塞，将阻止其他线程尝试进入读取的模式。While the thread is blocked, other threads that try to enter read mode are blocked. 当所有线程均都退出读取模式时，可升级的阻塞的线程进入写入模式。When all threads have exited from read mode, the blocked upgradeable thread enters write mode. 如果有其他线程等待进入写入模式，则它们保持阻止状态，因为可升级模式在单个线程使它们无法访问资源的独占权限。If there are other threads waiting to enter write mode, they remain blocked, because the single thread that is in upgradeable mode prevents them from gaining exclusive access to the resource. 可升级模式中的线程退出时写入模式，正等待进入读取的模式的其他线程可以执行操作，因此除非有线程正等待进入写入模式。When the thread in upgradeable mode exits write mode, other threads that are waiting to enter read mode can do so, unless there are threads waiting to enter write mode. 可升级模式中的线程可以升级和降级无限期，只要它是将写入到受保护资源的唯一线程。The thread in upgradeable mode can upgrade and downgrade indefinitely, as long as it is the only thread that writes to the protected resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果允许多个线程进入写入模式或可升级模式，必须允许一个线程以独占进入可升级模式。If you allow multiple threads to enter write mode or upgradeable mode, you must not allow one thread to monopolize upgradeable mode. 否则，线程尝试进入写入模式下直接将无限期阻塞，和其他线程而阻塞，将不能进入读取的模式。Otherwise, threads that try to enter write mode directly will be blocked indefinitely, and while they are blocked, other threads will be unable to enter read mode. 可升级模式中的线程可以降级到读取模式下的第一个调用方法，然后再调用方法。A thread in upgradeable mode can downgrade to read mode by first calling the method and then calling the method. 此降级模式允许针对所有锁定递归策略甚至。This downgrade pattern is allowed for all lock recursion policies, even . 降级为读取模式之后, 在线程不能重新输入进入可升级模式直到它已退出读取模式。After downgrading to read mode, a thread cannot reenter upgradeable mode until it has exited from read mode. ## 输入锁以递归方式Entering the Lock Recursively 您可以创建通过使用支持递归锁条目构造函数来指定锁定策略，并指定。You can create a that supports recursive lock entry by using the constructor that specifies lock policy, and specifying . > [!NOTE] > 对于新开发，不建议使用递归，因为它引入了不必要的复杂性，并使代码更容易出现死锁。The use of recursion is not recommended for new development, because it introduces unnecessary complications and makes your code more prone to deadlocks. 有关，允许使用递归，以下可以认为可以进入的模式：For a that allows recursion, the following can be said about the modes a thread can enter: - 读取模式中的线程可以输入以递归方式读取的模式，但不能进入写入模式或可升级模式。A thread in read mode can enter read mode recursively, but cannot enter write mode or upgradeable mode. 如果它尝试为此，引发。If it tries to do this, a is thrown. 进入读取模式后再进入写入模式或可升级模式是一种模式有死锁的可能性会强，因此不允许。Entering read mode and then entering write mode or upgradeable mode is a pattern with a strong probability of deadlocks, so it is not allowed. 如前面所述，对于锁升级所需的情况提供可升级模式。As discussed earlier, upgradeable mode is provided for cases where it is necessary to upgrade a lock. - 可升级模式中的线程可以进入写入模式和/或读取的模式，而且可以进入三种模式以递归方式。A thread in upgradeable mode can enter write mode and/or read mode, and can enter any of the three modes recursively. 但是，尝试进入写入模式块读取模式中是否有其他线程。However, an attempt to enter write mode blocks if there are other threads in read mode. - 写入模式中的线程读取的模式和/或可升级模式，可以输入，并且可以输入任意三种模式以递归方式。A thread in write mode can enter read mode and/or upgradeable mode, and can enter any of the three modes recursively. - 线程没有进入该锁可以输入任何模式。A thread that has not entered the lock can enter any mode. 此尝试也可能阻塞尝试输入非递归锁的原因相同。This attempt can block for the same reasons as an attempt to enter a non-recursive lock. 线程可以退出其已进入任意顺序的模式，只要它退出完全按照无数次，它进入该模式每种模式。A thread can exit the modes it has entered in any order, as long as it exits each mode exactly as many times as it entered that mode. 如果一个线程尝试退出模式的次数过多，或若要退出它没有进入，模式引发。If a thread tries to exit a mode too many times, or to exit a mode it has not entered, a is thrown. ## 锁定状态Lock States 您可能会发现其状态的锁的想象。You may find it useful to think of the lock in terms of its states. 一个可以是四种状态之一： 不进入、 读取、 升级和写入。A can be in one of four states: not entered, read, upgrade, and write. - 未输入： 在此状态下，没有线程已进入锁定 （或所有线程均已都退出锁）。Not entered: In this state, no threads have entered the lock (or all threads have exited the lock). - 读取： 在此状态下，一个或多个线程进入锁定用于读访问到受保护的资源。Read: In this state, one or more threads have entered the lock for read access to the protected resource. > [!NOTE] > 一个线程可以通过使用读取模式中输入该锁或方法，或可升级模式从其降级。A thread can enter the lock in read mode by using the or methods, or by downgrading from upgradeable mode. - 升级： 在此状态下，一个线程已进入锁定状态进行读访问，将无法升级，以写入访问权限 （即，在进入可升级模式下），以及零个或多个线程进入锁定用于读访问。Upgrade: In this state, one thread has entered the lock for read access with the option to upgrade to write access (that is, in upgradeable mode), and zero or more threads have entered the lock for read access. 一次最多一个线程可以输入选项以升级; 使用锁尝试进入可升级模式的其他线程被阻止。No more than one thread at a time can enter the lock with the option to upgrade; additional threads that try to enter upgradeable mode are blocked. - 写入： 在此状态下，一个线程已进入的锁定以进行写访问到受保护的资源。Write: In this state, one thread has entered the lock for write access to the protected resource. 该线程有锁的独占所有权。That thread has exclusive possession of the lock. 尝试进入锁定状态出于任何原因的其他任何线程被阻止。Any other thread that tries to enter the lock for any reason is blocked. 下表描述了锁定状态，不允许递归中，当一个线程的锁之间的转换`t`采用的最左侧列中描述的操作。The following table describes the transitions between lock states, for locks that do not allow recursion, when a thread `t` takes the action described in the leftmost column. 在时它会执行的操作，`t`具有无模式。At the time it takes the action, `t` has no mode. (特殊情况其中`t`中表脚注中介绍了可升级模式。)最上面一行描述该锁的起始状态。(The special case where `t` is in upgradeable mode is described in the table footnotes.) The top row describes the starting state of the lock. 单元格描述线程，会发生什么情况，并在括号中显示为锁定状态的更改。The cells describe what happens to the thread, and show changes to the lock state in parentheses. ||未输入 (N)Not entered (N)|Read (R)Read (R)|升级 (U)Upgrade (U)|写入 (W)Write (W)| |-|-----------------------|----------------|-------------------|-----------------| |`t` 进入读取的模式`t` enters read mode|`t` 进入 (R)。`t` enters (R).|`t` 如果多个线程处于等待状态的写入模式，则，阻塞否则为`t`进入。`t` blocks if threads are waiting for write mode; otherwise, `t` enters.|`t` 如果多个线程处于等待状态的写入模式，则，阻塞否则为`t`进入。1`t` blocks if threads are waiting for write mode; otherwise, `t` enters.1|`t` 块。`t` blocks.| |`t` 进入可升级模式`t` enters upgradeable mode|`t` 进入 (U)。`t` enters (U).|`t` 如果多个线程等待阻塞进入写入模式或升级模式;否则为`t`进入 (U)。`t` blocks if threads are waiting for write mode or upgrade mode; otherwise, `t` enters (U).|`t` 块。`t` blocks.|`t` 块。`t` blocks.| |`t` 进入写入模式`t` enters write mode|`t` 输入 (W)。`t` enters (W).|`t` 块。`t` blocks.|`t` 块。2`t` blocks.2|`t` 块。`t` blocks.| 1如果`t`启动出可升级模式，在进入读取的模式。1 If `t` starts out in upgradeable mode, it enters read mode. 此操作永远不会阻止。This action never blocks. 锁定状态不会更改。The lock state does not change. （在线程可以完成降级模式下读取退出可升级模式）。(The thread can then complete a downgrade to read mode by exiting upgradeable mode.) 2如果`t`初始进入可升级模式，它将阻塞多个线程处于读取模式。2 If `t` starts out in upgradeable mode, it blocks if there are threads in read mode. 否则它将升级为写入模式。Otherwise it upgrades to write mode. 锁定状态将更改写入 (W)。The lock state changes to Write (W). 如果`t`块中，因为多个线程处于读取模式，它将进入写入模式，只要在最后一个线程退出读取的模式，即使有线程正等待进入写入模式。If `t` blocks because there are threads in read mode, it enters write mode as soon as the last thread exits read mode, even if there are threads waiting to enter write mode. 因为在线程退出锁定状态更改时下, 一个线程被唤醒，选中，如下所示：When a state change occurs because a thread exits the lock, the next thread to be awakened is selected as follows: - 首先，正在等待的线程写入模式，并已在进入可升级模式 （可以有最多一个此类线程）。First, a thread that is waiting for write mode and is already in upgradeable mode (there can be at most one such thread). - 如果没有，正在等待写入模式的线程。Failing that, a thread that is waiting for write mode. - 如果没有，正在等待进入可升级模式的线程。Failing that, a thread that is waiting for upgradeable mode. - 如果没有，正在等待读取模式下的所有线程。Failing that, all threads that are waiting for read mode. 后续状态的锁始终为写入 (W) 中的第一个的两个用例和升级 (U) 中的第三个的情况下，而不考虑现有线程触发状态更改时的锁定状态。The subsequent state of the lock is always Write (W) in the first two cases and Upgrade (U) in the third case, regardless of the state of the lock when the exiting thread triggered the state change. 在最后一种情况下，锁的状态是升级 (U)，如果一个线程中没有进入可升级模式后的状态更改和 Read (R) 否则，而不考虑以前的状态。In the last case, the state of the lock is Upgrade (U) if there is a thread in upgradeable mode after the state change, and Read (R) otherwise, regardless of the prior state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用整数键包含字符串的简单同步的缓存。The following example shows a simple synchronized cache that holds strings with integer keys. 实例用于同步对可用作内部缓存。An instance of is used to synchronize access to the that serves as the inner cache. 该示例包含将添加到缓存、 从缓存中删除和从缓存中读取的简单方法。The example includes simple methods to add to the cache, delete from the cache, and read from the cache. 为了演示超时，该示例包含仅当它可以指定超时内执行此操作将添加到缓存的方法。To demonstrate time-outs, the example includes a method that adds to the cache only if it can do so within a specified time-out. 为了演示可升级模式，该示例包括检索与键关联的值的方法，并将其与新值进行比较。To demonstrate upgradeable mode, the example includes a method that retrieves the value associated with a key and compares it with a new value. 如果值保持不变，该方法将返回状态指示没有变化。If the value is unchanged, the method returns a status indicating no change. 如果键不找到任何值，则插入键/值对。If no value is found for the key, the key/value pair is inserted. 如果值已更改，将其更新。If the value has changed, it is updated. 可升级模式允许从读取访问权限来写入访问权限，根据需要而无需导致死锁升级的线程。Upgradeable mode allows the thread to upgrade from read access to write access as needed, without the risk of deadlocks. 该示例包含嵌套的枚举，用于指定演示了可升级模式的方法的返回值。The example includes a nested enumeration that specifies the return values for the method that demonstrates upgradeable mode. 该示例使用默认构造函数创建锁，因此不允许递归。The example uses the default constructor to create the lock, so recursion is not allowed. 编程是更简单且更不易出错，当锁不允许递归。Programming the is simpler and less prone to error when the lock does not allow recursion. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#12)] 下面的代码然后使用`SynchronizedCache`要存储蔬菜名称的字典对象。The following code then uses the `SynchronizedCache` object to store a dictionary of vegetable names. 它将创建三个任务。It creates three tasks. 第一个蔬菜到数组中存储的文件名写入`SynchronizedCache`实例。The first writes the names of vegetables stored in an array to a `SynchronizedCache` instance. 第二个和第三个任务显示蔬菜，按降序排序的第二个 （从低到高索引的索引） 升序排序的第一个的名称。The second and third task display the names of the vegetables, the first in ascending order (from low index to high index), the second in descending order. 最后一项任务搜索字符串"cucumber"，并找到的话，当调用方法来替换字符串"绿色 bean"。The final task searches for the string "cucumber" and, when it finds it, calls the method to substitute the string "green bean". [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#13)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个初始化与此构造函数不允许使用递归。A that is initialized with this constructor does not allow recursion. 也就是说， 属性将返回 。That is, the property returns . 有关递归策略及其效果的详细信息，请参阅枚举和类。For more information about recursion policy and its effects, see the enumeration and the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用整数键包含字符串的简单同步的缓存。The following example shows a simple synchronized cache that holds strings with integer keys. 实例用于同步对可用作内部缓存。An instance of is used to synchronize access to the that serves as the inner cache. 无参数构造函数用于创建该锁。The parameterless constructor is used to create the lock. 该示例包含将添加到缓存、 从缓存中删除和从缓存中读取的简单方法。The example includes simple methods to add to the cache, delete from the cache, and read from the cache. 为了演示超时，该示例包含仅当它可以指定超时内执行此操作将添加到缓存的方法。To demonstrate time-outs, the example includes a method that adds to the cache only if it can do so within a specified time-out. 为了演示可升级模式，该示例包括检索与键关联的值的方法，并将其与新值进行比较。To demonstrate upgradeable mode, the example includes a method that retrieves the value associated with a key and compares it with a new value. 如果值保持不变，该方法将返回状态指示没有变化。If the value is unchanged, the method returns a status indicating no change. 没有值找到的密钥，将插入键/值对。It no value is found for the key, the key/value pair is inserted. 如果值已更改，将其更新。If the value has changed, it is updated. 可升级模式允许从读取访问权限来写入访问权限，根据需要而无需导致死锁升级的线程。Upgradeable mode allows the thread to upgrade from read access to write access as needed, without the risk of deadlocks. 该示例包含嵌套的枚举，用于指定演示了可升级模式的方法的返回值。The example includes a nested enumeration that specifies the return values for the method that demonstrates upgradeable mode. 该示例使用默认构造函数创建锁，因此不允许递归。The example uses the default constructor to create the lock, so recursion is not allowed. 编程是更简单且更不易出错，当锁不允许递归。Programming the is simpler and less prone to error when the lock does not allow recursion. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#12)] 下面的代码然后使用`SynchronizedCache`要存储蔬菜名称的字典对象。The following code then uses the `SynchronizedCache` object to store a dictionary of vegetable names. 它将创建三个任务。It creates three tasks. 第一个蔬菜到数组中存储的文件名写入`SynchronizedCache`实例。The first writes the names of vegetables stored in an array to a `SynchronizedCache` instance. 第二个和第三个任务显示蔬菜，按降序排序的第二个 （从低到高索引的索引） 升序排序的第一个的名称。The second and third task display the names of the vegetables, the first in ascending order (from low index to high index), the second in descending order. 最后一项任务搜索字符串"cucumber"，并找到的话，当调用方法来替换字符串"绿色 bean"。The final task searches for the string "cucumber" and, when it finds it, calls the method to substitute the string "green bean". [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/classexample1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/classexample1.vb#13)]

param.span: 枚举值之一，用于指定锁定递归策略。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the lock recursion policy.

summary.span: 在指定锁定递归策略的情况下初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the lock recursion policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 递归策略用于确定在多次输入锁的线程上的限制。Recursion policy determines the restrictions on threads that enter the lock more than once. 例如，如果在创建时锁定和一个线程已进入读取模式锁定如果线程尝试以重新输入该锁在读取模式下，将引发。For example, if a lock was created with and a thread has entered the lock in read mode, is thrown if the thread tries to reenter the lock in read mode. 同样，如果线程已进入写入模式锁定如果线程尝试以重新输入该锁在任何模式下，将引发。Similarly, if a thread has entered the lock in write mode, is thrown if the thread tries to reenter the lock in any mode. > [!NOTE] > 可升级模式中的线程可以升级为写入模式或降级为读取模式而不考虑锁定递归策略设置。A thread in upgradeable mode can upgrade to write mode or downgrade to read mode regardless of the lock recursion policy setting. 无论递归策略，最初进入的线程读取模式下不允许，升级到可升级模式或写入模式，因为这种方式导致死锁的概率。Regardless of recursion policy, a thread that initially entered read mode is not allowed to upgrade to upgradeable mode or write mode, because that pattern creates a strong probability of deadlocks. 有关递归策略及其效果的详细信息，请参阅枚举和类。For more information about recursion policy and its effects, see the enumeration and the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个异常情况，一种取决于设置，并且其中一个却没有。The following example shows two exception scenarios, one that depends on the setting and one that does not. 在第一个方案中，线程进入读取的模式，并尝试以递归方式进入读取的模式。In the first scenario, the thread enters read mode and then tries to enter read mode recursively. 如果使用默认构造函数，它将递归策略设置为创建，将引发异常。If the is created by using the default constructor, which sets recursion policy to , an exception is thrown. 如果用于创建，不会引发异常。If is used to create the , no exception is thrown. 在第二个方案中，线程进入读取的模式，然后尝试进入写入模式。In the second scenario, the thread enters read mode and then tries to enter write mode. 是引发而不考虑锁定递归策略。 is thrown regardless of the lock recursion policy. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/cs/ClassExample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/vb/ClassExample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/cs/ClassExample1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/vb/ClassExample1.vb#12)] 下面的代码然后使用`SynchronizedCache`要存储蔬菜名称的字典对象。The following code then uses the `SynchronizedCache` object to store a dictionary of vegetable names. 它将创建三个任务。It creates three tasks. 第一个蔬菜到数组中存储的文件名写入`SynchronizedCache`实例。The first writes the names of vegetables stored in an array to a `SynchronizedCache` instance. 第二个和第三个任务显示蔬菜，按降序排序的第二个 （从低到高索引的索引） 升序排序的第一个的名称。The second and third task display the names of the vegetables, the first in ascending order (from low index to high index), the second in descending order. 最后一项任务搜索字符串"cucumber"，并找到的话，当调用方法来替换字符串"绿色 bean"。The final task searches for the string "cucumber" and, when it finds it, calls the method to substitute the string "green bean". [!code-csharp[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/cs/ClassExample1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/vb/ClassExample1.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/cs/ClassExample1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.LockRecursionPolicy/vb/ClassExample1.vb#13)]

summary.span: 获取已进入读取模式锁定状态的独有线程的总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of unique threads that have entered the lock in read mode.

value.span: 已进入读取模式锁定状态的独有线程的数量。

span.span: The number of unique threads that have entered the lock in read mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程只计算一次，即使该锁允许递归和线程已进入读取的模式多次。A thread is counted only once, even if the lock allows recursion and the thread has entered read mode multiple times. 使用此属性仅用于调试、 分析和日志记录目的，而不适用于控制算法的行为。Use this property only for debugging, profiling, and logging purposes, and not to control the behavior of an algorithm. 一旦计算完，可以更改结果。The results can change as soon as they have been calculated. 因此，不安全地做出决策基于此属性。Therefore, it is not safe to make decisions based on this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性生成一个事件日志条目，如果在读取模式中的线程数超过阈值。The following example shows how to use the property to generate an event log entry if the number of threads in read mode exceeds a threshold. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/vb/source.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/vb/source.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/cs/source.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Aux/vb/source.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 始终调用发布到最后一个引用之前对象。Always call before you release your last reference to the object.

summary.span: 尝试进入读取模式锁定状态。

span.span: Tries to enter the lock in read mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到调用线程进入锁，并因此可能永远不会返回。This method blocks until the calling thread enters the lock, and therefore might never return. 使用方法来阻止指定的间隔时间，并返回调用线程不具有已进入读取模式，在此间隔期间。Use the method to block for a specified interval, and then return if the calling thread has not entered read mode during that interval. 多个线程可以在同一时间进入读取的模式。Multiple threads can enter read mode at the same time. 如果一个或多个线程在等待进入写入模式，线程的调用方法受到阻止，直到这些线程超时或已进入写入模式，然后从其已退出。If one or more threads are waiting to enter write mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁允许使用递归，线程已进入读取模式锁定可以递归方式进入读取的模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in read mode can enter read mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode. 当其他线程处于读取模式时，最多一个线程可以处于可升级模式。At most one thread can be in upgradeable mode while other threads are in read mode. 如果其他线程等待进入可升级模式，并且有没有线程在等待进入写入模式，线程调用方法立即进入读取的模式，不会阻止。If additional threads are waiting to enter upgradeable mode, and there are no threads waiting to enter write mode, threads that call the method enter read mode immediately and do not block. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进入读取模式锁定。The following example shows how to use the method to enter the lock in read mode. 在示例中所示的方法检索与键关联的值。The method shown in the example retrieves the value associated with a key. 如果未找到键，由内部引发的异常允许 terminate 方法。If the key is not found, the exception thrown by the inner is allowed to terminate the method. 一个`finally`块用于执行方法，从而调用方退出读取的模式。A `finally` block is used to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits read mode. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 尝试进入可升级模式锁定状态。

span.span: Tries to enter the lock in upgradeable mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到调用线程进入锁，并因此可能永远不会返回。This method blocks until the calling thread enters the lock, and therefore might never return. 使用方法来阻止指定的间隔时间，并返回如果调用线程在此间隔期间未进入可升级模式。Use the method to block for a specified interval, and then return if the calling thread has not entered upgradeable mode during that interval. 如果线程通常访问的受保护的资源使用可升级模式在读取模式，但可能需要满足某些条件时进入写入模式。Use upgradeable mode when a thread usually accesses the resource that is protected by the in read mode, but may need to enter write mode if certain conditions are met. 可升级模式中的线程可以降级到读取模式或升级，以写入模式。A thread in upgradeable mode can downgrade to read mode or upgrade to write mode. 只有一个线程可以在任何给定时间进入可升级模式。Only one thread can enter upgradeable mode at any given time. 如果某个线程处于可升级模式，并且有没有线程在等待进入写入模式，任意数量的其他线程可以输入读取的模式，即使线程在等待进入可升级模式。If a thread is in upgradeable mode, and there are no threads waiting to enter write mode, any number of other threads can enter read mode, even if there are threads waiting to enter upgradeable mode. 如果一个或多个线程在等待进入写入模式，线程的调用方法受到阻止，直到这些线程超时或已进入写入模式，然后从其已退出。If one or more threads are waiting to enter write mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁定允许使用递归，线程已进入可升级模式锁定可以输入以递归方式进入可升级模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in upgradeable mode can enter upgradeable mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进入可升级模式锁定。The following example shows how to use the method to enter the lock in upgradeable mode. 一个`finally`块用于执行方法，从而调用方退出可升级模式。A `finally` block is used to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits upgradeable mode. 在示例中所示的方法检索与键关联的值，并将其与新值进行比较。The method shown in the example retrieves the value associated with a key and compares it with a new value. 如果值保持不变，该方法将返回状态指示没有变化。If the value is unchanged, the method returns a status indicating no change. 没有值找到的密钥，将插入键/值对。It no value is found for the key, the key/value pair is inserted. 如果值已更改，将其更新。If the value has changed, it is updated. 可升级模式允许升级读取的锁定，根据需要而无需导致死锁的线程。Upgradeable mode allows the thread to upgrade the read lock as needed, without risk of deadlocks. 该示例使用默认构造函数创建锁，因此不允许递归。The example uses the default constructor to create the lock, so recursion is not allowed. 编程是更简单且更不易出错，当锁不允许递归。Programming the is simpler and less prone to error when the lock does not allow recursion. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 尝试进入写入模式锁定状态。

span.span: Tries to enter the lock in write mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到调用线程进入锁，并因此可能永远不会返回。This method blocks until the calling thread enters the lock, and therefore might never return. 使用方法来阻止指定的间隔时间，并返回如果调用线程在此间隔期间未进入写入模式。Use the method to block for a specified interval, and then return if the calling thread has not entered write mode during that interval. 如果其他线程已进入读取模式锁定线程的调用方法受到阻止，直到这些线程均已退出读取模式。If other threads have entered the lock in read mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have exited read mode. 有线程在等待进入写入模式，其他线程尝试进入读取的模式或可升级模式块之前等待进入写入模式的所有线程的超时或已进入写入模式，然后又从中退出。When there are threads waiting to enter write mode, additional threads that try to enter read mode or upgradeable mode block until all the threads waiting to enter write mode have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁允许使用递归，线程已进入写入模式锁定可以递归方式进入写入模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in write mode can enter write mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进入写入模式锁定。The following example shows how to use the method to enter the lock in write mode. 在示例中所示的方法将新的键/值对添加到已同步的缓存。The method shown in the example adds a new key/value pair to the synchronized cache. 如果密钥已在缓存中，由内部引发的异常允许 terminate 方法。If the key is already in the cache, the exception thrown by the inner is allowed to terminate the method. 一个`finally`块用于执行方法，从而调用方退出写入模式。A `finally` block is used to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits write mode. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 减少读取模式的递归计数，并在生成的计数为 0（零）时退出读取模式。

span.span: Reduces the recursion count for read mode, and exits read mode if the resulting count is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是递归顺序对敏感的。This method is not sensitive to recursion order. 例如，如果一个线程进入可升级模式中的锁，然后进入读取模式锁定的顺序在线程退出两种模式不重要。For example, if a thread enters a lock in upgradeable mode and then enters the lock in read mode, the order in which the thread exits the two modes does not matter. 如果锁定允许使用递归，线程可以进入写入模式锁定状态，然后输入它以递归方式在读取模式下;线程退出读取模式和写入模式下并不重要的顺序。If a lock allows recursion, a thread can enter the lock in write mode and then enter it recursively in read mode; the order in which the thread exits read mode and write mode does not matter. 退出锁可能会向其他等待线程发出信号。Exiting the lock might signal other waiting threads. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`finally`块执行方法，从而调用方退出读取的模式。The following example shows how to use a `finally` block to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits read mode. 在示例中所示的方法检索与键关联的值。The method shown in the example retrieves the value associated with a key. 如果未找到键，由内部引发的异常允许 terminate 方法。If the key is not found, the exception thrown by the inner is allowed to terminate the method. 方法用于进入读取的模式。The method is used to enter read mode. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 减少可升级模式的递归计数，并在生成的计数为 0（零）时退出可升级模式。

span.span: Reduces the recursion count for upgradeable mode, and exits upgradeable mode if the resulting count is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是递归顺序对敏感的。This method is not sensitive to recursion order. 例如，如果一个线程进入可升级模式中的锁，然后进入写入模式锁定的顺序在线程退出两种模式不重要。For example, if a thread enters a lock in upgradeable mode and then enters the lock in write mode, the order in which the thread exits the two modes does not matter. 如果锁定允许使用递归，线程可以进入写入模式锁定，然后输入它以递归方式进入可升级模式; 中在其中在线程退出可升级模式和写入模式的顺序不重要。If a lock allows recursion, a thread can enter the lock in write mode and then enter it recursively in upgradeable mode; the order in which the thread exits upgradeable mode and write mode does not matter. 退出锁可能会向其他等待线程发出信号。Exiting the lock might signal other waiting threads. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`finally`块执行方法，从而调用方退出可升级模式。The following example shows how to use a `finally` block to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits upgradeable mode. 在示例中所示的方法检索与键关联的值，并将其与新值进行比较。The method shown in the example retrieves the value associated with a key and compares it with a new value. 如果值保持不变，该方法将返回状态指示没有变化。If the value is unchanged, the method returns a status indicating no change. 没有值找到的密钥，将插入键/值对。It no value is found for the key, the key/value pair is inserted. 如果值已更改，将其更新。If the value has changed, it is updated. 可升级模式允许升级读取的锁定，根据需要而无需导致死锁的线程。Upgradeable mode allows the thread to upgrade the read lock as needed, without risk of deadlocks. 该示例使用默认构造函数创建锁，因此不允许递归。The example uses the default constructor to create the lock, so recursion is not allowed. 编程是更简单且更不易出错，当锁不允许递归。Programming the is simpler and less prone to error when the lock does not allow recursion. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/source.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/source.vb#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/cs/source.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim_Shadow/vb/source.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecursionPolicy As LockRecursionPolicy
public: property System::Threading::LockRecursionPolicy RecursionPolicy { System::Threading::LockRecursionPolicy get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 对象的递归策略。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the recursion policy for the current object.

value.span: 枚举值之一，用于指定锁定递归策略。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the lock recursion policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 递归策略用于确定在多次输入锁的线程上的限制。Recursion policy determines the restrictions on threads that enter the lock more than once. 例如，如果在创建时锁定和一个线程已进入读取模式锁定如果线程尝试以重新输入该锁在读取模式下，将引发。For example, if a lock was created with and a thread has entered the lock in read mode, is thrown if the thread tries to reenter the lock in read mode. > [!NOTE] > 可升级模式中的线程可以升级为写入模式或降级为读取模式而不考虑锁定递归策略设置。A thread in upgradeable mode can upgrade to write mode or downgrade to read mode regardless of the lock recursion policy setting. 无论递归策略，最初进入的线程读取模式下不允许，升级到可升级模式或写入模式，因为这种方式导致死锁的概率。Regardless of recursion policy, a thread that initially entered read mode is not allowed to upgrade to upgradeable mode or write mode, because that pattern creates a strong probability of deadlocks. 有关递归策略及其效果的详细信息，请参阅枚举和类。For more information about recursion policy and its effects, see the enumeration and the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为 0 （零），则此方法检查锁定状态，并返回`false`立即如果所需的状态不可用。If `millisecondsTimeout` is 0 (zero), this method checks the lock state and returns `false` immediately if the desired state is unavailable. 多个线程可以在同一时间进入读取的模式。Multiple threads can enter read mode at the same time. 如果一个或多个线程在等待进入写入模式，线程的调用方法进行阻止，直到这些线程已是超时或已进入写入模式，然后退出，或调用线程的自己的超时间隔过期。If one or more threads are waiting to enter write mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it, or until the calling thread's own time-out interval expires. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁允许使用递归，线程已进入读取模式锁定可以递归方式进入读取的模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in read mode can enter read mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode. 一个线程可以是可升级模式，而其他线程都在读取模式下。One thread can be in upgradeable mode while other threads are in read mode. 如果其他线程等待进入可升级模式，并且有没有线程在等待进入写入模式，线程调用方法立即进入读取的模式，不会阻止。If additional threads are waiting to enter upgradeable mode, and there are no threads waiting to enter write mode, threads that call the method enter read mode immediately and do not block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为 0 （零），则此方法检查锁定状态，并返回`false`立即如果所需的状态不可用。If `millisecondsTimeout` is 0 (zero), this method checks the lock state and returns `false` immediately if the desired state is unavailable. 如果线程通常访问的受保护的资源使用可升级模式在读取模式，但可能需要满足某些条件时进入写入模式。Use upgradeable mode when a thread usually accesses the resource that is protected by the in read mode, but may need to enter write mode if certain conditions are met. 可升级模式中的线程可以升级为写入模式或降级为读取模式。A thread in upgradeable mode can upgrade to write mode or downgrade to read mode. 在任何给定时间，只有一个线程可以进入可升级模式中输入一个锁。Only one thread can enter a lock in upgradeable mode at any given time. 如果某个线程处于可升级模式，并且有没有线程在等待进入写入模式，任意数量的其他线程可以输入读取的模式，即使线程在等待进入可升级模式。If a thread is in upgradeable mode, and there are no threads waiting to enter write mode, any number of other threads can enter read mode, even if there are threads waiting to enter upgradeable mode. 如果一个或多个线程在等待进入写入模式，线程的调用方法进行阻止，直到这些线程已是超时或已进入写入模式，然后退出，或调用线程的自己的超时间隔过期。If one or more threads are waiting to enter write mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it, or until the calling thread's own time-out interval expires. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁定允许使用递归，线程已进入可升级模式锁定可以输入以递归方式进入可升级模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in upgradeable mode can enter upgradeable mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为 0 （零），则此方法检查锁定状态，并返回`false`立即如果所需的状态不可用。If `millisecondsTimeout` is 0 (zero), this method checks the lock state and returns `false` immediately if the desired state is unavailable. 如果其他线程已进入读取模式锁定线程的调用方法进行阻止，直到这些线程均已退出读取的模式或超时间隔已过去。If other threads have entered the lock in read mode, a thread that calls the method blocks until those threads have exited read mode or until the time-out interval has elapsed. 尽管等待进入写入模式，将阻止线程，尝试进入读取的模式或可升级模式的其他线程阻塞，直到所有线程正等待进入都写入模式，具有任一超时或已进入都写入模式，然后从其退出。While threads are blocked waiting to enter write mode, additional threads that try to enter read mode or upgradeable mode block until all the threads waiting to enter write mode have either timed out or entered write mode and then exited from it. > [!NOTE] > 如果锁允许使用递归，线程已进入写入模式锁定可以递归方式进入写入模式，即使其他线程正在等待进入写入模式。If a lock allows recursion, a thread that has entered the lock in write mode can enter write mode recursively, even if other threads are waiting to enter write mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进入写入模式下，超时时间的锁定。在示例中所示的方法将新的键/值对添加到已同步的缓存。The following example shows how to use the method to enter the lock in write mode, with a time-out. The method shown in the example adds a new key/value pair to the synchronized cache. 如果指定的超时间隔结束线程进入锁定之前，该方法返回`false`。If the specified time-out interval elapses before the thread enters the lock, the method returns `false`. 该方法将返回`true`如果添加键/值对。The method returns `true` if the key/value pair is added. 如果密钥已在缓存中，由内部引发的异常允许 terminate 方法。If the key is already in the cache, the exception thrown by the inner is allowed to terminate the method. 一个`finally`块用于执行方法，从而调用方退出锁。A `finally` block is used to execute the method, ensuring that the caller exits the lock. 此代码是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性仅用于调试、 分析和日志记录目的，而不适用于控制算法的行为。Use this property only for debugging, profiling, and logging purposes, and not to control the behavior of an algorithm. 一旦计算完，可以更改结果。The results can change as soon as they have been calculated. 因此，不安全地做出决策基于此属性。Therefore, it is not safe to make decisions based on this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性生成一个事件日志条目，如果被阻止，等待进入可升级模式的线程数超过阈值。The following example shows how to use the property to generate an event log entry if the number of threads that are blocked, waiting to enter upgradeable mode, exceeds a threshold.
